This application is part of an ongoing research aiming to raise user awareness regarding online privacy and targeted advertising. The current version of the app shows two visualisations, highlighting how much sensitive data is accessed by the applications.
 
Both visualisations show a word cloud of all the applications installed and their permissions, respectively. The size of each word (permission or application name) is given by its frequency while the colours range from green - not sensitive, to red - highly sensitive data.
